CutSceneText.Text: Nyahahahaha, you turncoat! Not bad, not bad!!!
Thanks to you, we can steal the Elyos' supplies! Nyahahahaha!
What?! I was going to ignore that...
Have you forgotten that you were driven out of your own country?
Worthless orc! I ought to tear you limb from limb!
Stop it. This isn't the time to be quarreling.
You can carry on later once we've annihilated the Elyos in Tijerid.
They must suspect something in Tijerid by now.
We need to complete the mission before Yurid's military information ceases to be useful.
Let's set off and destroy them right away!!
... Then let's discuss the plan in more detail.
